TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EntryWrittenEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EntryWrittenEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor. It creates a custom <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> object and writes an entry into it. Then it creates an EntryWrittenEventArgs object using the first entry in the custom <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>. This object is used to notify a message.
[!code-vb[EntryWrittenEventArgs_ctor1#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.diagnostics.ent_1.vb)] [!code-cs[EntryWrittenEventArgs_ctor1#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.diagnostics.ent_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[EntryWrittenEventArgs_ctor1#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.diagnostics.ent_1.cpp)]

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EntryWrittenEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor. It creates a custom <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> object and writes an entry into it. Then it creates an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EntryWrittenEventArgs> object using the first entry in the custom <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>. This object is used to notify a message.
[!code-cs[EntryWrittenEventArgs_ctor2#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/1e1e5f7e-0d7d-466e-981e-_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[EntryWrittenEventArgs_ctor2#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/1e1e5f7e-0d7d-466e-981e-_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[EntryWrittenEventArgs_ctor2#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/1e1e5f7e-0d7d-466e-981e-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets the event log entry that was written to the log.
Docs.value: An that represents the entry that was written to the event log.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example assumes that you have already implemented the sample in <xref:System.Diagnostics.EntryWrittenEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry%29>.
It creates a custom <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> object and writes an entry into it. Then it creates an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EntryWrittenEventArgs> object using the first entry in the custom EventLog. This object is used to notify a message.
[!code-cs[EntryWrittenEventArgs_ctor2#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.diagnostics.ent_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[EntryWrittenEventArgs_ctor2#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.diagnostics.ent_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[EntryWrittenEventArgs_ctor2#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.diagnostics.ent_1.vb)]
